page.title: 02FARMING.
page.content: In the Fen the most common crops are sugar beet, wheat,barley and potatoes.The machinery they use are tractors,drill,discs,power harrows,rollers,sprayers,combine harvester,sugar beet harvesters and loaders. You see black soil,so the fens are good crop grounds.Most farmers have good harvests.A farmer has about eight fields.The fens are flat grounds and good for planting crops.All the fens are ploughed then planted.The creatures that eat the farmer's crops are birds,worms and aphids.The liquids farmers spray on their crops are fertilisers and weed killer.Farmers sometimes fatten bullocks.As the land is so flat it can flood.Strong winds can blow away the seeds and soil.There is a pig farm on Northorpe Fen.A few farmers have flocks of sheep.
